about_the_game:
The Vanilla Department sent Mr. Inspector to investigate a mysterious island named "N", where the Sweet Kingdom is located. The islanders have been evading taxes for a very long time, and the previous inspector has gone missing... The rumors say that the Wicked Witch cast a curse on this land. It's high time to deal with all this mess!

  • The Department tasked you with a thorough inspection of the local residents. Strip them naked!
  • All the crooks must be punished and put behind bars!
  • You need to figure out what happened to the previous inspector.
  • The Wicked Witch must answer for her crimes!
  • You ought to save the royal family... Especially the Princess.

"Vanilla Inspector" is an exciting adventure set in a fairy-tale world. Colorful hand-drawn graphics, memorable characters, funny dialogues and tricky puzzles await your arrival!

If you still haven't made up your mind, here are some of the game features:

  • An entire island to explore: three villages, a beach inhabited by a mermaid, a witch's tower and a royal castle.
  • A plethora of characters that you'd love to see without their clothes...
  • A wide variety of puzzles: word search, battles and butterflies.
  • Fascinating plot and multiple endings, which depend on the choices you make!
  • Alluring cartoony characters that will lighten up your mood!

Come and have a nice time!

name: Vanilla Inspector

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 69 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 recommended. Mouse.

short_description: This is an inspection! Stay calm and take all your clothes off...
